name: Relais Francesca

reviews.text: For any travellers wishing to stay just outside of busy and noisy Sorrento centre, this B&B is the perfect choice. A stones throw from the station and two stops from Sorrento Centre on the train, it is easily accessible and costs only 1 Euro each way (make sure you verify your ticket in the orange machines at the Piano Di Sorrento station otherwise you are liable for a fine on the trains). Trains are at least every 10 minutes into Sorrento although the last train back is at 11.30pm. Taxi's cost about 20 Euro's if you want to come back later.
reviews.title: Friendly service, excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Curreri bus stops close to the B&B and this is the best way to get too and from the airport (costs 4 Euro's per person each way). The return stop is a little harder to find but one of the staff gave us a lift in his car to the bus stop on the way back to save us lugging our bags across the town. Trains also run directly from Naples to Piano Di Sorrento.
reviews.title: Quiet Appartments two stops on local train from Sorrento- avoid noisy Sorrento
Loved the charm of piano di sorrento
reviews.text: We loved how Piano di sorrento is a quieter version of sorrento, with a charm of its own. It's only 5 minutes from the train station, so you can get to the noisier, more touristy regions in a short time. Don't forget to validate your train ticket in the orange boxes before boarding. We had no problems with our room, though a security light outside our door would have been handy to find our door key. The breakfast was similar to other european ones I have experienced, though most of these were at hostels. We did enjoy the homemade cakes/pastries that were provided along with the packaged goods each day, just choose wisely. The piano foreshore was being developed at the time of our stay, so we envisage that piano will be a stunning place to visit in the future. We strongly recommend you walk to town to have dinner at osteria arcadia in corso italia 177. The owner was the friendliest person we met on our trip and cooks the most delicious, honest, fresh and local produce we experienced. The food was also very reasonably priced!

likes.disliked: — very narrow footpaths, making it difficult to carry luggage and requires vigilance for traffic

reviews.text: Relais Francesca is located in Piano, and is 5 minutes walk from the local train station and 2 stops from Sorrento. While its close to Sorrento, it does become a bit of a pain travelling back and forth as Piano doesn't really have anything except a couple of local shops in the main square.
reviews.title: Nice place for a couple of nights

reviews.text: The B&B itself is a well maintained, modern and clean villa. The rooms are a little small, but they are perfectly comfortable. Not all rooms have balconies, so specifically request one if you want one - or there is a 'private' room at the back of the villa which we stayed in at first, but it can be cold and is a bit of a garage conversion.
reviews.title: Not completely satisfied with this hotel
rain falls mainly on the plain of sorrento
reviews.text: My main problem with this hotel is the noise. The walls are paper thin, and I could actually hear everything that the rooms around us were all doing - When the room next to us ran the tap in their bathroom each morning it woke us up! Its in a quiet village but, there are dogs next door which bark a lot, and then there is a strange ritual twice daily ritual of which I can only explain is a recording of gunshots to frighten birds away from the local orchards!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is a little poor - typical italian style, sweet pastries, melba toast packets, and some salami and cheese - For a bed and breakfast, it could be improved! Overall, its good value for a couple of nights, but any longer would start to irritate even the most patient of people.
reviews.title: Good value for money

description: Relais Francesca is a B&B near Sorrento that give you all hotel’s comports and the convenience of a Bed and Breakfast.The b&b is in a strategic position to visit Sorrento, Capri and the Amalfi Coast and to reach the most famous places around the Sorrento Area. Each room has private bathroom with shower and modern air conditioning systems, to make the rooms fresh in summertime and comfortably warm in wintertime. All have hairdryer, satellite TV, frigo, desk and safe.
